DOC.brief_summary: The BENEDICT study is conducted to examine the effects of an ACE inhibitor, calcium channel blockade, a combination of these, and placebo, in the prevention of micro- and macro-albuminuria in Type 2 diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Study for Prevention of Kidney Disease in Diabetic Patients (BENEDICT)
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Hypertension Albuminuria (Phase A) Nondiabetic renal disease Subject has a hypersensitivity to ACE inhibitor, CCB
